frontmatter.title: PaperFaces portrait of Mates of State
frontmatter.excerpt: PaperFaces portrait of Mates of State drawn with Paper for iOS on an iPad.

markdownRemark.html:
Korie and Jason from the band Mates of State. Drawn predominantly with the pencil tool on a light orange background, with a hint of watercolor.

Tools used:

  • Pogo Connect Bluetooth Smart Pen
  • Paper for iOS
